SAGE JavaDoc

The Simple Adaptable Game Engine (SAGE) package provides a collection of routines intended to support interactive 3D game development.

See: Description

sage.util  
The Simple Adaptable Game Engine (SAGE) package provides a collection of routines intended to support interactive 3D game development. Many of the classes in the package require access to the JOGL (Java OpenGL binding) library (javax.media.opengl and related packages). Some classes also require access to the JInput Java Game Controller API packages. Some classes also require access to the JBullet Java port of the Bullet physics library. These libraries must be in the CLASSPATH in order to compile code which references SAGE classes.
